channel.title: Who will do co-op?
channel.description:
Okay, so according to the wiki, co-op could "potentially arrive after the release of SP, but would not be made by the Black Mesa official team."
That's all fine and dandy. Yet if co-op is to be made, would that mean somebody would have to copy the materials that were made by the BMS Devs?
Would that even be legal? Because according to the website, the mod is "© 2004-2010 Black Mesa Modification Team."
Even then, would any mod deveopers that have worked on BMS be willing to take on the project? :fffuuu:

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
OpFor CoOp. shudder

Or you could do a Counter Operative “Perfect Dark” style adversial co op where the other player takes command of various soldiers.

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.description:
imho coop from perspective of hecu soldiers and gordan freeman is the target.

each mission will start from the beginning of chapter and end when the hecu players kill gordpn freeman. if he gets to the end point of the chapter, coop players lose round and the map switches to the next chapter.

Read full topic

I was just throwing it out there as an idea. I’m not here to argue semantics. :jizz:

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
punisher1565:

:what: That person (forgot her name) who is a hologram in the tutorial of the game. This would work relativity well, because she can fade out whenever an event that revolves around Gordon occurs.

You mean Gina Cross? The person who already starred in a different HL Co-op?

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: punisher1565
item.description:
Glottis:

Do you guys really want a co-op for BMS? playing the original hl campaign with 2 people wasn’t that great(sven coop on the other hand…), it just wasn’t designed for that. Now custom made maps using BMS materials is a whole different story

I’m not sure about you guys… but I’ve been hoping for co-op since I heard of this mod.

(LAN party FTW!)

To answer the question of who could fight along side Mr. Freeman, Colette Green and Gina Cross from HL Decay would make a good option.

Even though these characters are disagreeable, there are still many other characters that could be made specifically for Co-op.

Here are my ideas for characters (cheezy as they may be, I’m just showing options)…

Gordon has signed up with a school in order to bring a kid to work…

:tired: Security Guard who is Ex-Military decides he wants to help Gordon, in order to get out.

:what: That person (forgot her name) who is a hologram in the tutorial of the game. This would work relativity well, because she can fade out whenever an event that revolves around Gordon occurs.

A soda machine maintenance worker whom doesn’t want to be killed by aliens.

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
punisher1565:

And what about this “Raminator” person.

Whoever she is, she seems to be dedicated enough to make a co-op.

She definitely has the nose for it, that’s for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: Glottis
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

coughcough*
Um, hello, just exactly where have you played HL with two players that wasn’t of the SvenCoop design? Where have you and a friend been given multiplayer quicksaves?

well what i ment to say is that i didn’t enjoy sven co op’s hl1 maps as much as i enjoyed maps the community put out

EDIT: now if someone redid Decay? that would be amazing, but very doubtful

I beg to differ. Co-Op adds tons to replayability. Playing a game for the tenth time, which I will most definitely do when Blackmesa is out, is a lot more fune when you can play with a friend/friends.

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: punisher1565
item.description:
punisher1565:

Well… so far, the above quote sounds like the most reasonable solution towards BMS co-op.

Not really… but on a serious subject… who is willing to spend the time?

Will it be a BMS DEV? A SYNERGY DEV? WHOM WILL IT BE???

And what about this “Raminator” person.

Whoever she is, she seems to be dedicated enough to make a co-op.

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: flyaway888
item.description:
Maxey:

I don’t know, maybe the dev team would give permission for someone or some group to make a co-op mode?

I mean, it makes sense when you think about it, doesn’t it?

Everyone who is interested can make BM Co-op!

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: TheKeeper
item.description:
It would be really uncool if Bms didn’t OK a third party to use their source material. And to be honest kinda hypocrite, you don’t see Valve being all tight ass with the stuff they’ve worked on. But wtv, its up to them. I just want the mod at this point, could be unfinished i don’t care. P.S. God bless those Synergy boys. They work fast and support their stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Who will do co-op?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
I really hope this isn’t just left to the synergy team to handle. I feel like this conversation has to have taken place multiple times.

“okay, multiple people can get onto the same map? Check. Okay, lets throw in some vehicle spawn for each player and call it a day. player balance? what if someone get stuck? respawning with half health and a single set of ammo, even though they’re in the middle of a firefight that they came into with full health and suit power and completely filled and STILL died? Save games? What nonsense are you talking about? they have infinite spawns and when someone gets to the end of the map, they’ll drag everyone else to the end too. It’s not like that will interfere with enjoying the game at all.”

Read full topic
